basic.description:
Large ensemble for qualified players of orchestral instruments. Course includes weekly rehearsals of a wide variety of repertoire, and a minimum of one concert per term for all students.  Credit attained only with regular attendance, active participation, and ample preparation.
NOTE    Placement is made at the discretion of the School of Music, after audition.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Symphony Orchestra

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    MUSC162 and registration in a BMUS Program, or permission of the School upon audition.
